data:
Here is a product box for PREVENT-IA:

**Name:** PREVENT-IA
**Slogan:** "Empowering a Safer Workplace, One Training at a Time"
**Benefits:**
"Transform your workplace safety with PREVENT-IA, the AI-powered education platform designed to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention. With our innovative solution, you can:
• Reduce workplace accidents and ensure a safer work environment
• Facilitate access to on-site ORP training and monitoring
• Track and measure the effectiveness of your training programs"

**Features:**
"PREVENT-IA offers a range of features that make it the ideal solution for companies engaged in high-risk activities. Some of the key features include:
• AI-driven chat for resolving doubts and clarifying concepts
• Links to certification pages for easy access to training materials
• Generation of content from updated sources to ensure relevance and accuracy
• Evaluation of learning outcomes to measure the effectiveness of your training programs
• Report generation to track progress and identify areas for improvement
• Annotation of content to facilitate easy navigation and understanding
• Complementing content with verified sources to ensure credibility and reliability
• Organizing information by topics and chapters to facilitate easy learning
• Including corporate content to make the training more relevant and engaging
• Assigning training to workers and tracking their progress
• User profile management to ensure personalized learning experiences"

**Image:** A visually appealing image of a group of workers in a safe and healthy work environment, with a tablet or laptop in the foreground displaying the PREVENT-IA platform. The image should convey a sense of safety, efficiency, and effectiveness.

**Elevator Pitch:** "For companies engaged in high-risk activities that seek to prevent accidents and ensure the safety of their workers, PREVENT-IA is the solution you need. Our AI-based training platform guides users through learning about Occupational Risk Prevention, offering an interactive and personalized learning experience that is unmatched by competitors. With PREVENT-IA, you can reduce workplace accidents, improve training effectiveness, and create a safer work environment for your employees."
